titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act with respect to priority review vouchers.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S5760)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

bill.summary:
6/18/2008--Introduced.
Amends the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to require that priority review vouchers, which are given by the Secretary of Health and Human Services to the sponsor of a tropical disease product application, are transferable to sponsors of human drug applications for approval of a new drug or biological product. Prohibits such vouchers from being redeemed to affect the review of a pending human drug application.
